Add ActiveX Controls to Palette Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System (Windows)

Select Tools»Import»ActiveX Controls to Palette to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to add ActiveX controls to the Controls palette for later use. You can add more than one control at a time by pressing the <Ctrl> key while you click the controls you want to add.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Controls—Lists the ActiveX controls registered on the computer.
